data.author: Naomi Alba
data.content: We Booked a taxi with Carlson, the communication was fast and excellent. On arrival our driver Adrew was waiting for us, he is very friendly and helped us get a Tanzania sim card. Also, at the Airport immediately while checking out their is a board showing price to Arusha or Moshi 50 usd and we had booked for 45 usd. I recommend this company!!
